mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT rowNum R, B.* FROM (SELECT * FROM NOTICE WHERE num>0 ORDER BY num DESC)B ) WHERE R BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{lastRow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE (NUM, TITLE, CONTENTS, WRITER, REGDATE, HIT) VALUES (NOTICE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{contents}, #{writer}, SYSDATE, #{hit})
